website_summaries.verdict: A unique, beautiful set of 4 glasses that add a pop of color to any party.
pros: The Libbey glasses came in a set of stunning colors – perfect for remembering which glass is yours
We loved the "Z" style stem on the glass, both for its aesthetic appeal and its functionality
The glasses are comfortable to hold
Made of a thick, high quality glass
We found the glasses to be quite stable despite the "Z" stem
cons: The multi colored stems are not likely to fit in with your existing glassware

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my step daughters margarita themed gift basket. So funky fun! Holds just the right amount. She loves them. <3
customer_reviews.author: Heather Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife when I gifted her the Margaritaville Key West Frozen Concoction Maker and they go perfectly together. She pulls them out every time we host and they quickly become the envy of the party. Larger than the average margarita glass, colorful, and solid. I wouldn't put them in the dishwasher though.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Different and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses, so different! Not your usual looking Margarita stemware!
customer_reviews.author: YvrTex

customer_reviews.title: Nice margarita glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses and a real conversational glass since the stem is bent.
customer_reviews.author: LYNDA MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So nice, I also bought a set ad a gift.
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Yay Margs!
customer_reviews.text: Holds my margaritas well! :) They're pretty and the colors are great. Everyone knows which one is theirs. I'm really good at dropping stuff and these have stood the test!
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Look and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: So the glasses are great looking in person even more so than when you see them online. Colors (colours) are great. I am not much of a kitchen wear or glass expert but me being somewhat of a brute have hit them with other glasses in the cupboard and they have yet to break.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Serrette

customer_reviews.title: Great value, and decently made
customer_reviews.text: Great value, and decently made. Sturdy glasses that hold about 12-16 oz of liquid. Fairly well made, nice colors so nobody gets their drink mixed up. Would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: rdpoint

customer_reviews.title: Arriba Margaritas!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are so festive! They're the perfect color, size, and shape for delicious margaritas! They look like they won't easily break either, which is great. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Book Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design. Sturdy and something you could be proud to gift to others
customer_reviews.author: Norma Heptinstall

customer_reviews.title: Beauty & Libby commercial quality, in your home!
customer_reviews.text: Solid, takes a beating where others would break. Adults drinking is rough stuff, these can take it & make your guests feel special with lovely glasses (I use them for magaritas). The colors help folks find their drink. I never hesitate using these, perfect stemware.
customer_reviews.author: Ko

customer_reviews.title: Great Margarita Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great margarita glasses. Gave them to the mother for a present and she loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS DESCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: The only reason i ordered these Margarita was for the color. Of course the two boxes i ordered for a birthday gift were clear and had no color. Im returning asap and have to go out shopping now!!!
customer_reviews.author: ICU

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my son's girl friend. I have not seen them yet but she was happy to get them and used them right away. By her response I would recommend these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie J

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: First thing that I loved about ordering these was the shipping. I recieved my glasses days before I was even expecting them. These glasses themselves are gorgeous and durrable enough that if you acidently drop them a little they do not shatter. I droped on of them on my carpet and was expecting it to break but it didn't. The different colors make it easy to keep track of who's drink belong to who and the odd shaped stems always earn me compliments when I have guests over.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyShihoin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I have been looking for! The price was great! The colors are beautiful! I now feel "special" when I make a margarita for myself!
customer_reviews.author: K. Santoyo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for entertaining! Each guest has their own identified colored glass.
customer_reviews.author: Ardena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice glasses, but they were all clear, the stems were not colored.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hutfles

customer_reviews.title: pretty margarita glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses, everyone knows which drink is theirs, with the different colors, they also hold a lot, they are not small, very nice glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Janice P from Miami

customer_reviews.title: Different!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of glasses, great colors, original design. They are glass, so easily broken, but what the heck, that's part of what makes them original.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are cool looking, bright and just as sturdy as any other. Only wish they were a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Order these for your collection!
customer_reviews.text: These are high-quality margarit glasses. Colors and stems make them lots of fun. My company always gives positve comments. Easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: P.A. CLARK

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of these and the fun style I just wish they were more durable so they wouldn't break so easily
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. The colored stems help keep track of whose drink is whose. Would definitely buy more to make my set larger.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sterba

customer_reviews.title: Adds a nice pop of color
customer_reviews.text: These look very nice for the price. The design is cool. The bottoms seem very sturdy and the glass is the perfect weight
customer_reviews.author: Kristian Hargett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift and she loved them so much she is ordering 4 more!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy W.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't recommend these more! They are of high quality with a great fun look! Very happy with this purchase. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: CJL Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Add these glasses to your next bash and it will party time for sure
customer_reviews.text: These Margarita glasses arrived perfect and they are beautiful, high quality and will be a hit at your next party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses but the color has come off within a month of use.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are nice, but am very disappointed that the color on the bottom of the glasses have started to come off within month of purchase. Would not recommend purchasing these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Not the glasses I actually ordered
customer_reviews.text: The glasses I received were not the glasses that I ordered. They were clear glass that did not have colors to them. Since I bought them to put in a gift basket, I decided to use them anyway. They were just okay, nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. We used these over Memorial Day weekend. Nice colors and the size is perfect. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Molloy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Glasses!!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked around several places before I saw these. These glasses are really nice and unique. I had a get together on Sunday and they were a hit! Great price and fast shipping too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These glasses exceeded my expectations. They are sturdy and the colored stems really make them stand out. The price was good. I definitely plan to order a 2nd set.
customer_reviews.author: VAmom614

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for my step mother and she loved them. If you have friends over and you set your glass down, it will be easy to know which glass is yours.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these margarita glasses. I was looking to buy something for my mom and she said she wanted something colorful; once I saw these, I knew she would love them.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Glass is quite heavy. Very nice, classy glasses. I Love the color. Great price. Do not hesitate to buy these
customer_reviews.author: Patty L. Densmore

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my beach home. I wanted something different and colorful for enjoying margaritas on the deck. These were the perfect glasses for our "fun in the sun."
customer_reviews.author: Jan Vincins

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter and son-in-law to go with the margarita machine I bought them. Was very impressed with price and quality. Thick glass and very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: DEBPHILLIPS

customer_reviews.title: Margarita glasses
customer_reviews.text: The colorful stems on these beautiful glasses make any occasion fun and festive. It is also easy to identify who belongs to which glass! Really like them. Dishwasher safe as well. Arrived very promptly too. From amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Moe

customer_reviews.title: Housewarming gift a bit hit
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product to any serious mix drink fan works very well indoors and also outdoors by the pool
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware......False Advertsing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware.......False Advertising!!! They are NOT colored as noted in picture and description. They are clear with NO color what-so-ever. What a disappointment and waist of time.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley W Stansbury

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are really great glasses for the price and definitely takes enjoying your margarita's to another level ... we love them!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene M

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom for Christmas. They look just like the picture and are made of hard glass. Haven't used them yet
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Dolan

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I got the glasses today without any color in the base. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: murugess

customer_reviews.title: Okay... today we received our re-order for ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay...today we received our re-order for Libbey Colors Margarita glasses AND again we recieved the wrong glasses...These are plain glass, not colors! I will give anyone a 2nd chance...and I did; so now I have 4 sets of glasses & all are still wrong!!! HELLO! Now what?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong glasses and terrible packing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these glasses as a gift - received plain old "mucho margarita glasses" and the packing was horrendous. I'm astounded nothing was broken. One glass was sticking halfway out of the box which was floating in a larger box with about 30 little peanut packing pieces. Barely enough to cover the bottom of the box.NIH and there was a random small piece of bubble wrap thrown in there.just floating around serving no purpose. Will be returning these but am afraid to re-order the glasses that were requested because I am worried they will be wrong again.
customer_reviews.author: tiff mckee

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Cute
customer_reviews.text: These margarita glasses were exactly what we wanted. Didn't want plain ones or real expensive ones. Each person can have there own color. Loved the price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Fun Margarita Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift, and the person loved them. Unique, fun, well-made, and reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Derbie

customer_reviews.title: Good size, good quality
customer_reviews.text: These margarita glasses are for people who want to enjoy their margarita, not just get drunk. That said, these are a nice size, without being too big (jumbo size that seems to be so popular these days). The quality and coloring of the glass is nice. The glass shape is also not as exaggerated (top half vs. bottom half of the liquid holding portion), giving it a more elegant look. My wife loved these as one of her Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: masterhankshake

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Party Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I like to occasionally mix some drinks when I have people over. This glass set looks nice with the multi colors. The good part about these are if you happen to drink too much, you can remember which drink is yours by the color. Jokes aside... the glass on these are clear and sturdy. I would recommend hand washing instead of throwing them in a dish washer. They keep drinks cold for a while. I usually put them in the freezer for 10 min before I serve the drinks. It gives them a frosted look.
customer_reviews.author: SOUL N3MESIS

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was expecting!
customer_reviews.text: A nice weight and style. Easy to handle. Nice quality. Just what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyAngel

customer_reviews.title: Cute addition to a bar
customer_reviews.text: I bought these, along with the Martini set, for our new bar and I absolutely love them. They are very cute and whimsical. The colored bottoms help people keep track of their glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and friendly Margarita glasses.
customer_reviews.text: These go along with my libby tall glassware, small glassware and shot set. They add the perfect amount of fun coloring to your bar or cocktail glasses. The colors shine through making them a happy addition to the set.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Gately

customer_reviews.title: These glasses work very nice. They are also very attractive
customer_reviews.text: These glasses work very nice. They are also very attractive. I like the crooked stem because it seems to fit my hand better.
customer_reviews.author: MargeL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and style of these glasses. Instant hit with our guests at our vacation home
customer_reviews.author: Couldnotthinkofagoodname

customer_reviews.title: I bought multiple boxes of these (4 I believe) and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought multiple boxes of these (4 I believe) and out of each box was at least 1 broken :( If not for the broken glasses (and of course if they could have been twice as big), they'd have been 5 star
customer_reviews.author: 2k3Mach1

customer_reviews.title: Cool Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to go with the Nostalgia Electrics Margarita slush maker and the kids fell in love with them. They are good quality and fun at the same time. They were surprised that they were glass and not plastic and it just made them love them more. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lori J. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Functional
customer_reviews.text: We get a lot of compliments on these glasses. Love the different colors so everyone always knows which glass is theirs. Despite the wavy stem, these glasses are perfectly stable.
customer_reviews.author: Cathee

customer_reviews.title: ... present for a friend and they showed up in perfect condition, which is always a worry when shipping ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these as a birthday present for a friend and they showed up in perfect condition, which is always a worry when shipping glass. They are fun and have great color, she loved them! We wound up breaking them out right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can always count on the Libbey name.
customer_reviews.text: This Margarita set is really cute. Great for parties so no one gets the wrong glass. They are sturdy too. Love them. Can always count on the Libbey name.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Libby Colors Margarita Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were delivered today and are just beautiful. Love pretty glasses to drink from and these are going to be fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Anntracker

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality glasses and I love the crooked stems and colored bases - perfect for getting the party started and sits nicely on the base of the margarita/slushy machine that I bought from Amazon. It's going to be a fun summer!!
customer_reviews.author: Love the Beach

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are very well made, and the four different colors give them an extra air of excitement. Dare I say that a marguerite tastes so much better in one? It's true! I highly recommend these beautiful glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kapp-Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Glasses. I wanted some inexpensive Margarita glasses as ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Glasses. I wanted some inexpensive Margarita glasses as high quality as possible. These are GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful !!!, they are exactly like the picture. Nice quality not cheap, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fun glasses to drink your Margaritas out of. The colored stems also make it esier to claim your glass after a few cocktails! The glasses are made of sturdy thick glass and should last a long time. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: BeanMa

customer_reviews.title: Fun and funky party glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a birthday. She loves the glasses, they are fun, funky and cool. Great for parties and easy to keep track of which glass is yours based on the color. One was knocked over on it's side and didn't break, this durability wasn't tested on all the glasses but was glad to see that it didn't shatter.
customer_reviews.author: SpruceGoose

customer_reviews.title: FESTIVE AND FUN!
customer_reviews.text: These are fun and beautiful at the same time. The "bent" stem actually makes it easier to hold. The colors are so festive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty & the colors make them easier to remember which glass your drinking from
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Smith

customer_reviews.title: Libbey Margarita glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses...they are very colorful and unique. The twisted handles really make them look different. Had some friends over for A Mexican dinner and these were perfect to serve Margarita's in. With them being different colors people were able to remember which glass was theirs.
customer_reviews.author: sophie

customer_reviews.title: Libbey Colors Margarita Glass Set
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses! They arrived quickly and without damage! Love how the glasses have different colored stands - no need for drink charms! Very good size as well. Would recommend these and might possibly buy another set myself!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Abernethy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets and everyone who's seen them ask where I got them. They are the perfect size and are easy to hold on to.
customer_reviews.author: B Weekes

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Festive Yet Frugal
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my wife for Christmas. She loves the look of the glasses and they feel great as well. Libbey makes some great products.
customer_reviews.author: Monopoly J

customer_reviews.title: What can you say
customer_reviews.text: they are awesome glasses. Gave as a gift, but liked them so much that I bought some for me as well

customer_reviews.title: The Margaritas glass set is very nice was gift for my wife she love the glasses ...
customer_reviews.text: The Margaritas glass set is very nice was gift for my wife she love the glasses the price was very good

customer_reviews.title: really cute
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law got a margarita maker for his birthday. The glasses were the perfect addition to make it complete and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Anne E. Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really do like these glass, They have a little weight to them and look elegant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice very nice I would recommend these to my friends.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: these were well made and adorable. Sturdy stems with just the right amount of color. Are a great gift for anyone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of glasses, the look good and make a great addition to our drinking set-up!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift - enjoyed by all for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Lauwereins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gave me these and they are so fun! and D/W safe!
customer_reviews.author: sewcrazy8989

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set. They are fun and great quality. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: suzie

customer_reviews.title: pretty glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Got these to use with the CoronaRita drink clips, but the bowl is too small. However, they're so cute, I had to keep them. When I opened them, one of the glasses had a straight stem, rather than the z-shape, but exchanging the set was no problem. So even if you buy as a gift, make sure you check them.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas gift. My aunt loves to drink martinis. I thought these glasses had an interesting stem, so I bought them. Her favorite color is purple, so I wish you could pick the bottom color. You get 4 different bottom colors. I don't like that. I like uniformity. This is why I gave 4/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L Costello

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are nice .And I like the fact no one i know has them. My guest seem to like them also.The stems are all not the same color so you know which is yours unless it's one of those nights you drank so much you just don't know if your coming or going lol
customer_reviews.author: J. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Libbey Colors Margarita Glass Set
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy these for a friend of mine because he loves margaritas. I love the unique way thay are designed and so did he.
customer_reviews.author: julie recipko

product_meta.title: Libbey Colors Margarita Glass Set, 4-Piece
product_meta.description: Add some color to your table with Libbey’s festive Z-Colors margarita glasses. This set includes four 12 ounce z-stem margarita glasses. The bottom of each glass shows off a different bold color - lime, magenta, turquoise or orange - and makes a wonderful wedding, housewarming, or host gift. Glasses are dishwasher safe and made in the USA.
feature_bullets: Four 12 ounce z-stem margarita glasses, bottom of each glass shows off a different bold color - lime, magenta, turquoise or orange
Great wedding, housewarming, or host gift

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars165 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
